title: Blood Throughout The Night
description: Blood Throughout The Night is about three individuals named Jack, Justin, and Detective Sunny Rivers. These three people come together by a life changing experience. Jack and Justin are bitten by two different vampires. Justin flees the city after being bitten and Jack becomes one of the most powerful vampires in the city. Jack pledges his allegiance to his maker King William Green. Jack has it all until one day the inner city streets run red with blood. The murders bring unwanted attention to the vampire nation. Jack is given a short amount of time to find the vampire responsible. He soon discovers that someone from his past is responsible for the murders. Jack will have to survive a ferocious new enemy, while Detective Rivers is out to destroy all the vampire clans. Enjoy a wild horror filled adventure.
author: Bobby Rodgers
